Text: Why the file size so big ?? And why the unusual format? A TS file ?? What is that ? Sure I can open it with VLC, I'm not a noob... but why use this kind of format that isn't common ?
I can't argue with the quality though... wow!
However, I having bugs... the image seams to freeze for a couple seconds here and there. Not often, but often enough to get annoying. And no, it's not my computer (because I know someone will say it)

first of all thnx for this awesome upload . Please upload it every week like this.

the reason its 17.56 gb is coz its full HD plus now raw is 3 hours long.

shaban96: I don't think the reason for it being 17G is because it's HD and 3hours... first, it's not 3h, it's 2h30 (commercials are removed.

Second, Rudos' uploads are full HD, and for a ±1h30 show, it goes around 5Gig. Quick maths, Rudos' upload for the 2h30 show would then be around 9Gig...

I think the REAL reason for it being so big is the codec used (TS). Don't get me wrong, this is a great upload, great quality (except for the freezes I talked about). I just wanted to argue with shaban96 :)
